text:
Ronald Jack Wright (born April 8, 1953) is an American politician. He is a Republican. He has been a member of the U.S. House of Representatives for since 2019. He served on the Arlington's city council from 2000 to 2008. He was mayor pro-tem of Arlington from 2004 to 2008.
Wright was born in Jacksonville, Texas. In 2019, he reported he had been diagnosed with lung cancer.
